issue.title: [C++] Merge parquet/util/test-common.h into common arrow/testing directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4514](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4514). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Many of these functions exist already or in slightly modified form elsewhere
